articles.author: By Lilit Marcus and Alex Stambaugh, CNN
articles.title: Australia to reopen to vaccinated international travelers this month
articles.description: Australia will open its borders to fully vaccinated international travelers from late February, Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison announced on Monday, February 7 after a meeting of the government's national security committee.
articles.content: CNN's Teele Rebane contributed reportingSydney Harbour photo by EPA-EFE/Shutterstock
